# Installation needed for the pipeline 

For this project the following libraries are needed: 
- mysql-connector-python version: 8.0.18 (used with python 3.8)

mysql.conenctor library may require configuration of environment to solve Library dependencies. In this project a conda environment was used with the following commands in the shell: 

```{r, eval = FALSE}
conda create -n project name
conda install -c anaconda mysql-connector-python
```
